summary: I collaborated with class peers to build this full stack app! This app allows users to post teddy bears (or any other stuffed animal) for sharing and selling! Think of OfferUp but for stuffed animals!
tech: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, Handlebars.js, Materialize, MySQL, Git Bash, Heroku, Bcrypt.js, Passport, AWS S3 & Cognito, Multer & MulterS3, Tiny Cloud, SplideJS, JawsDB

summary: A React app to act as a hub for the games I've created! These games are super simple but it allows me to keep working on my coding skills!
tech: JavaScript, Git Bash, GIPHY Developers API, React, Bootstrap, Express, Node.js, Heroku

summary: Another React app to showoff React skills! This full stack app allows the user to search for and save books! The book information is obtained from the Google Books API and saved books are stored in a MongoDB!
tech: JavaScript, Git Bash, MongoDB, Mongoosejs, Express, React, Node.js, Bootstrap, Heroku, Google Books API

summary: This was the first app I built using React! It's a simple app that queries the Random User API for a list of random people that the user can search and sort through! Showing off React skills!
tech: JavaScript, Node.js, Git Bash, React, Bootstrap, Random User API

summary: Another full stack app I collaborated with class peers on! This app allows users to organize their parties! Users can add a party to their home page, add a schedule, invite attendees, add supplies, and view past parties!
tech: JavaScript, Node.js, Git Bash, React, Express, Bootstrap, Firebase, Cloudinary, Mapbox, MongoDB, Mongoosejs, Heroku

summary: This full stack app allows users to keep track of their budget, even when they don't have a connection to the network! Building this app taught me a lot about how Progressive Web Applications work!
tech: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoosejs, Git Bash, Heroku, IndexedDB API, Service Worker API, Cache API, Webpack
